SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS MODIFY_DATE_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_VIEW ,DECODE(A.DRIVING_MODE_CHANGE_YN, 'Y','변경','-') AS DRIVING_MODE_CHANGE_VIEW ,DECODE(A.SPD_RANGE_CHANGE_YN, 'Y','변경','-') AS SPD_RANGE_CHANGE_VIEW ,DECODE(A.DEVICE_CHANGE_YN, 'Y','변경','-') AS DEVICE_CHANGE_VIEW ,ROUND((A.REG_DATE - A.MODIFY_DATE),0) - TO_NUMBER(NVL(B.DATA1,0)) || ' 일 경과' AS COLDIFF FROM TB_CL_HT_DEVICECHANGE A ,(SELECT DATA1 FROM TB_CM_MT_PARAMETER WHERE PARAM_ID = 'defice_ch_eff_date') B WHERE 1=1
A.CHANGE_ID = #sChgId#
A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo#
A.TMP_RACE_AGENCY LIKE '%'||#sTmpAg#||'%'
A.MODIFY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE( #stdate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE( #eddate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS MODIFY_DATE_VIEW ,TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE_VIEW ,DECODE(A.DRIVING_MODE_CHANGE_YN, 'Y','변경','-') AS DRIVING_MODE_CHANGE_VIEW ,DECODE(A.SPD_RANGE_CHANGE_YN, 'Y','변경','-') AS SPD_RANGE_CHANGE_VIEW ,DECODE(A.DEVICE_CHANGE_YN, 'Y','변경','-') AS DEVICE_CHANGE_VIEW ,ROUND((A.REG_DATE - A.MODIFY_DATE),0) - TO_NUMBER(NVL(B.DATA1,0)) || ' 일 경과' AS COLDIFF FROM TB_CL_HT_DEVICECHANGE A ,(SELECT DATA1 FROM TB_CM_MT_PARAMETER WHERE PARAM_ID = 'defice_ch_eff_date') B WHERE 1=1
A.TMP_RACE_NUMBER = #sTmpNo#
A.TMP_RACE_AGENCY LIKE '%'||#sTmpAg#||'%'
A.MODIFY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE( #stdate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE( #eddate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC
